ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, wow, you saved the Ark!  Let s throw a party!  Hate to break it to you, but that s not a great achievement. Anyway, I was misinformed then.  Either way,

Oh, wow, you saved the Ark!  Let's throw a party!  Hate to break it to you, 
but that's not a great achievement.

    Anyway, I was misinformed then.  Either way, the TM4 Driver is VOID until 
the Council votes on it.  Anyone who got the "magical powers" from it, don't 
have them anymore.  Next it will be a TM5 Driver, then we'll have tall 
demi-gods running around.
    There is also no need to be rude.  Of course if you'd like to 
continue...be my guest.  I would enjoy a laugh 

So it is written, so it shall be done.

Lord Unitron 
KSLawDogg@...
